Class ArchiveServerAsyncExceptionHandler

java.lang.Object
com.laoluade.ingestor.ao3.configs.ArchiveServerAsyncExceptionHandler
All Implemented Interfaces:
org.springframework.aop.interceptor.AsyncUncaughtExceptionHandler
public class ArchiveServerAsyncExceptionHandler extends Object implements org.springframework.aop.interceptor.AsyncUncaughtExceptionHandler

This class defines a custom AsyncUncaughtExceptionHandler for Archive Server application.

This class uses a Logger from the SLF4J API to print exception details to console.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    private static final org.slf4j.Logger
    AIAEHLogger
    This attribute is the logger used to record error messages when async exceptions happen.

    • handleUncaughtException

      public void handleUncaughtException(Throwable throwable, Method method, @Nullable Object... params)

      This method defines the logic for the asynchronous uncaught exception handler.

      Specified by:
      handleUncaughtException in interface org.springframework.aop.interceptor.AsyncUncaughtExceptionHandler
      Parameters:
      throwable - The thrown exception from the crashed task.
      method - The method where the exception originated from.
      params - The parameters entered into the method where the exception originated from.
